value:
My, my. Look at all of the eminent
bachelors here... All these purebreds,
ready for the taking!$k$pThen again, if I married somebody
from another world, sending money
home would get pretty tricky.

I know it's hard to believe, but I used
to be a border guard, swinging a
giant axe, of all things! Goodness!$k$pThe big problem was catching my
beauty sleep, with all those stupid
Chevois rebels making trouble.

You'd like me to defend the castle? Of
course! If something happens, I'll just
smash—I mean, I'll call for help!

Want to go for a stroll, just the two of
us? You do? In...the ruins? You...want
to summon Heroes? Uh, OK...

I've been working SO hard on
keeping my act up, and yet...the
fish just aren't biting. UGH!$k$pOh, forgive me... That evil little fairy
nipped me again. You know the one.
It just won't let me be! So naughty!

Why, hello there! Tell me... Are there
any rich, handsome, reliable and—
crucially—single men in your army?

I hope rich men like powerful
women...

There we go! I'm a wee bit
stronger now.

As you can see, I'm just a
delicate flower.

Why, thank you! I'll do my very
best out there.

I'm Charlotte, a Nohrian border guard.
I'm a delicate little thing, but I'll do
what I can. Tee-hee!

Oh, my! Who is that calling me? I can
hear you... Oh. It's you. I can drop the
act.$k$pHow's it going? You look fine—not
sick or hurt or anything. You don't
look that strong, so I worry about you.$k$pI mean... You keep on visiting me,
even though you know what I'm
really like. So, yeah, I think about you.$k$pMaybe that's your trick... You sucker
everybody into wanting to protect
you. I feel like I learned something...$k$pOf course I'm kidding. I know you're
not that manipulative. That's why
I like you. But if you die on me...
えいっ！
やあっ！
ふみゅう！
You meanie!
Don't underestimate me!
I will smash you so hard!
Overworked, underpaid!
Ooh, that evil little fairy!
It's...up to you now...
What?! Uh...yes?
I'll make you my extra-special lunch!
I'll do whatever I can to support the Order of Heroes!
My lustrous hair and healthy skin... How does it feel to touch them?
Being surrounded by all these upstanding Heroes... It's making me a little nervous.
What's that? You saw me slug an enemy? Oh, you! Such an imagination you have.
These stupid enemies keep underestimating ME, of all people! What a joke!
You know, you're pretty good at taking care of everyone. It throws me off, and I can't help but let my guard down around you.
Right.
Sure!
Scary!
